summary: REQ-16 is only partially addressed: the diff adds a deployment runbook and code/UI changes, but it does not provide evidence of an actual production deployment or production configuration updates that would “go live”.

missing_requirements.requirement: Perform a production deployment that updates both the backend canister code and the frontend assets so production reflects the working fix (Home “Show Me Encouragement” navigates to Encouragement and displays content), without breaking Internet Identity auth or existing user state.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains code changes and a new deployment guide, but no evidence of an executed production deployment or concrete production deployment configuration changes (e.g., dfx.json/canister IDs/network configs/CI release steps) is shown in the provided diff summary. The new DEPLOYMENT.md file is truncated and does not demonstrate that production was actually updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new go-live deployment runbook document.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-16 asks to publish/go live, but does not explicitly request adding documentation. This may be helpful, but it is an unrequested deliverable relative to the stated non-goal of not changing behavior beyond publishing.
